basics.name: Member Services Representative
basics.summary: Skilled relationship-builder who is able to establish easy rapport with customers, building trust and respect. Highly service-oriented individual who is responsive to need and thorough in follow-through. Organized, effective multitasker with excellent coordination skills and a keen attention to detail.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Promoted from Cashier to Lead Cashier to help train staff and facilitated huddles in the morning...
highlights: Promoted from Cashier to Lead Cashier, JP Morgan Chase Best of the Best Award, Top 5 Fraud Analyst, Member Service Representative promotion
